text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia suboblonga is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The size of an adult shell varies between 1.9 mm and 3 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Canary Islands
Cape Verde
Europe
European waters (ERMS scope)
Madeira
Central Mediterranean Sea
Morocco
Portuguese Exclusive Economic Zone
Spanish Exclusive Economic Zone
United Kingdom Exclusive Economic Zone
